description: Manifest defining mandatory, immutable constants used in Core Decision Axioms (COF and P-01 Finality Certification). These constants are required by GSEP-C V3.5 Layer L7.

tau_norm.rationale: Normalization constant used in COF to prevent division by zero and provide minimum risk weight.

epsilon_min.rationale: The minimum required viable margin (safety buffer) for P-01 Certification (S-01 > S-02 + epsilon).
